name: VIR-274.03 Verify that the admin users (content Admin, product admin, product manager, web site admin) have an access to the HAC for impex

userStory.narrative:
As a system, I require the ability to manage the categories and colors that each
school will be able to view on the shop.virco site via
impex so that I can control the consistency for the school.

title: VIR-274.03 Verify that the admin users (content Admin, product admin, product manager, web site admin) have an access to the HAC for impex
